text: Hello, I have a question. The primary key of a contact is the email, but can it be changed to another property?

Hallo,

Is there anyone that can assist on date property in a quote line item in the modern quote templates?
It shows as a Unix and not as a date format.

I cannot add this line 'int|datetimeformat('%m/%d/%Y', 'UTC', locale)' to the data table where it is pulling the data from because it is just this line: <td>{{ unit[item.column_property]}}</td> that gets the line items data in the quote.

So my property is a data selector property and I need that to be a date format in the quite line items.
